result.execSummary:
The defendant Nicolas A Wehrmeister was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).
  • Substantial Battery-Intend Bodily Harm, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(2).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

1:23 Defendant Nicolas A Wehrmeister in court with attorney Brian Thomas Smestad.  Defendant Nicolas A Wehrmeister in custody.  Kenneth N. Sortedahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  JP-clerk  Per Atty Smestad there is a resolution.  Per ADA - VR complied.   Not asking for amended information.  No firearm posession, Civil Rights.  Waives PSI.  Ct grants motion to amend count 3 to misd. posession 961.41 3(g)(e).  CT finds DE FVI&K enters plea.  DE pleads NC to mis. posession.  DE pleads NC to Count 6.  Ct accepts both pleas and finds DE guilty.  JOC entered.  Counts 1, 2, 4, & 5 R/I Dismissed.  Ex #1 - rest. request O&R.  Atty Smestad argument.  DE addresses ct.  

SENTENCING: 
Count 3 -  120 days straight sent.  subj to GT and WR.  Ct finds 90 days credit and timed served.  $265.60 fines/costs.  DNA sample and $200 surcharge.  Ct will not suspend license.  

Count 6 - WH sentence.  3 years probation.  No contact to continue, unless probation modifies.  follow thru with counseling, follow thru with probation.  $290.60 fines/costs.  $250 DNA surcharge.  Rest. $350.00.    8 days of sentence credit.  Ct orders addl. 120 days conditional JT, subj to WR, not subj to GT.   BOND to be applied to rest. first, then fines/costs.  Remainder of fines not paid by bond will be paid thru probation.  

Counts 1, 2, 4, & 5 R/I Dismissed.   1:55 adj.
and Order for Detainer - Filed by ADA Sortedahl  SIGNED 9/7/16
